#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,i,ctr[26],ctr1[26],result;
	char s[200];
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		result=0;
		cin>>s;
		for(i=0;i<26;i++)
		{
			ctr[i]=0;
			ctr1[i]=0;
		}
		for(i=0;s[i]!='\0';i++)
		{
			if(s[i]>='A'&&s[i]<='Z')
				ctr[s[i]-'A']++;
			else
				ctr1[s[i]-'a']++;
		}
		for(i=0;i<26;i++)
		{
			if( ctr[i]%2==0 && ctr[i]!=0 )
				result += ctr[i]/2;
			else if( ctr[i]%2==1 )
				result += (ctr[i]-1)/2 + 1;
		}
		for(i=0;i<26;i++)
		{
			 if( ctr1[i]%2==0 && ctr1[i]!=0 )
				result += ctr1[i]/2;
			 else if( ctr1[i]%2==1 )
				result += (ctr1[i]-1)/2 + 1;
		}
		cout<<result<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
